alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 323 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parkland, or over Coral Springs, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Margate, Coconut Creek, Parkland, Godfrey Road, Mission Bay, Loxahatchee NWR, Hillsboro Pines, Ramblewood East and Sandalfoot Cove. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County
